show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: and Dr Z
content:
Osteoporosis: What You Need to Know to Reduce Your Fracture Risk Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews… Keith McCormick, DC, CCSP.
  Dr McCormick is a chiropractic physician with a private practice in western Massachusetts, where he specializes in the nutritional management of patients with bone fragility and also in the treatment of sports injuries.
Dr McCormick graduated from Stanford University with a degree in Human Biology and earned his doctorate at the National College of Chiropractic.
He is a member of the American Society for Bone and Mineral Research, the International Bone and Mineral Society, and the Institute for Functional Medicine.
 Dr McCormick is a Certified Chiropractic Sports Physician with membership in the ACA Council on Sports Injuries and Physical Fitness.
He was a member of the United States Olympic Team competing in the XXI Olympiad in Montreal.
  Dr Keith is the Author of The Whole Body Approach to Osteoporosis.
On today’s show we will discuss how to get appropriate testing and customize a wholistic approach to improve bone health, reduce risk of fracture, and enjoy an active lifestyle.  Contact: www.osteonaturals.com
